verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> to my <S%H113>Lord,<s%> <S%H3427>Sit<s%> you at my <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> I <S%H7896>make<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%> your <S%H1916>footstool.<s%> <S%H7272><s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H4294>rod<s%> of your <S%H5797>strength<s%> out of <S%H6726>Zion:<s%> <S%H7287>rule<s%> you in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of your <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

Your <S%H5971>people<s%> shall be <S%H5071>willing<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H2428>power,<s%> in the <S%H1926>beauties<s%> of <S%H6944>holiness<s%> from the <S%H7358>womb<s%> of the <S%H4891>morning:<s%> you have the <S%H2919>dew<s%> of your <S%H3208>youth.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H7650>sworn,<s%> and will not <S%H5162>repent,<s%> You are a <S%H3548>priest<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> the <S%H1700>order<s%> of <S%H4442>Melchizedek.<s%>
The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> your <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> shall <S%H4272>strike<s%> through <S%H4428>kings<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H639>wrath.<s%>

He shall <S%H1777>judge<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> he shall <S%H4390>fill<s%> the places with the <S%H1472>dead<s%> <S%H1472>bodies;<s%> he shall <S%H4272>wound<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H776>countries.<s%>
He shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H5158>brook<s%> in the <S%H1870>way:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> shall he <S%H7311>lift<s%> up the <S%H7218>head.<s%>
